mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where No_Status='Y'
select No_Num,No_Title,No_Content, No_Write ,No_Date,No_Important,No_Status,m.M_NAME from notice, member m where No_Status='Y' and m.M_No = No_write order by DECODE( No_Important,'Y',1), No_Num desc

select No_Num,No_Title,No_Content, No_Write ,No_Date,No_Important,No_Status,m.M_NAME from notice, member m
where No_Status='Y' and m.M_No = No_write and No_Title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
where No_Status='Y' and m.M_No = No_write and No_Content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
where No_Status='Y' and m.M_No = No_write and (No_Title LIKE '%'||#{titleAndContent}||'%' or No_Content LIKE '%'||#{titleAndContent}||'%')
order by DECODE( No_Important,'Y',1), No_Num desc

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM notice WHERE No_Status='Y'
AND No_Title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
AND No_Content LIKE '%'||#{content}||'%'
AND (No_Title LIKE '%'||#{titleAndContent}||'%' or No_Content LIKE '%'||#{titleAndContent}||'%')
select * from notice where No_Num=#{no_Num} and No_Status='Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE.NEXTVAL, #{No_Title}, #{No_Content}, #{No_Write}, SYSDATE, #{No_Important}, DEFAULT)
